basics.name: Rajesh Kodaganti
basics.label: Software Engineer @ Quadrant Technologies
basics.summary: Software Engineer with expertise in Computer Engineering, Python, Azure AI, and Document Intelligence.

work.name: Quadrant Technologies
highlights: Designed and implemented ETL processes for security logs and vulnerability reports
Leveraged machine learning to analyze threat intelligence data for mitigation strategies
Developed data ingestion systems for endpoint and network security
Created monitoring dashboards for cloud security and compliance

work.name: Quadrant Technologies
highlights: Transitioned into full-time Software Engineer role after successful internship.

work.name: QikCell by tickioT
highlights: Collaborated with sales and technical teams to align customer needs with product capabilities
Developed and customized technical demonstrations to showcase product features
Assisted in troubleshooting and documenting solutions, reducing response times by 20%

work.name: ColorOS
highlights: Conducted user testing for ColorOS Beta and Alpha versions (5.0 to 12.1)
Identified bugs and suggested new features based on user feedback
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve software performance

work.name: Pantech ProEd Pvt Ltd
highlights: Contributed to the development of a high-speed 64-bit binary comparator
Optimized design parameters in collaboration with engineering team

work.name: PeopleLink Unified Communications Pvt. Ltd.
highlights: Conducted evaluations of prototypes ensuring functionality and quality
Contributed to the market release of products, reducing post-launch defects by 20%

education.institution: Jb Institute Of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: GasOps MTR extraction
projects.description: Designed a robust system for JSON extraction and document intelligence using Azure OCR and OpenAI.
highlights: Implemented Azure Document Intelligence OCR and AI mapping supporting Azure OpenAI
Built certificate and token-based API fetch by HeatNumber
Created robust JSON extraction from model responses and a backwards-compatible CLI shim

projects.name: Image Denoising using Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed a deep learning framework for image denoising targeting additive white Gaussian noise (AWGN).
highlights: Implemented a composite loss function incorporating pixel-wise MSE and FFT-based spectral loss
Designed a convolutional network with skip connections and frequency-aware branches
Achieved PSNR gains exceeding 12 dB at high noise levels

projects.name: Pre-owned Cars pricing forecast using R language
projects.description: Developed a Random Forest Regression model in R for pre-owned car price forecasting.
highlights: Achieved 85.67% accuracy on a dataset of 48,904 rows
Conducted extensive data preprocessing including handling missing values and categorical features

projects.name: 1X3 Router Design and Verification
projects.description: Designed and verified a 1x3 router using Verilog HDL.
highlights: Implemented synthesis constraints in Verilog
Performed verification using testbenches in Modelsim and synthesis in Quartus Prime

projects.name: Raspberry Pi Applications for Assistive Technologies
projects.description: Created reading aids for visually impaired individuals using Raspberry Pi and OCR technology.
highlights: Utilized Tesseract library and Python to convert document images into audio format
Integrated camera modules for real-time text capture

projects.name: PeopleLink "Look At Me" Controller
projects.description: Spearheaded circuit design for a smart camera controller for conference rooms.
highlights: Developed wired and wireless models with auto-focus capabilities on active speakers
Simplified installation and operation for collaborative environments
